description:
A squid spirit attacks Harumi and her friends while they are out for a trip at an amusement park. The Spirit Patrol quickly arrives at the scene, but Yukiko-hime gets captured by the squid spirit - can Enma-kun find a way to rescue Yukiko-hime from the spirit`s tentacles... and for that sake does he want to?
In the first place, why is the Spirit Patrol even in the human world? The secret behind it`s formation lies within this episode!
Source: Official Site

titles.title: Migi mo Hidari mo Youkai Darake Ja: Gozansenka
右も左も妖怪だらけじゃ~ござんせんか
